info.title: WiiPaint
info.author: Kontakatilu
info.description: Draw on Wii using a custom GRRLIB 2.0
info.details:
After starting the application, press 1 + 2 to sync your Wii Remote. 
Choose a color from the toolbox by pointing your cursor at the desired color and pressing A. 
To draw, hold A and move the Wii Remote.
